Yassine El Aamri

United Kingdom · (+44) 7909 800 752 · elaamriyass@gmail.com

A passionate and self-motivated developer, I transitioned from a career in tech support to pursue my love for programming. Having taught myself through various online courses, I’ve cultivated a strong foundation in software development, reflecting my drive to continuously learn and improve. My experience in technical support has equipped me with valuable transferable skills, such as problem-solving, troubleshooting, and communicating complex technical issues, all of which enhance my effectiveness as a programmer. I am excited to bring my enthusiasm and hands-on approach to building robust and efficient solutions in a development role.

Experience

Technical Assistance Center - European Supervisor

Interactive Brokers

Promoted to Supervisor, where I oversaw and optimized technical assistance operations across all European offices. I was responsible for coaching and training the support team to ensure timely resolution of technical issues. Additionally, I streamlined workflows and improved processes in collaboration with internal teams and stakeholders. I also developed and implemented service level agreements (SLAs) and key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure and enhance service quality.

Feb 2023 - March 2024

Technical Assistance Center - Senior Analyst

Interactive Brokers

Promoted to Senior Analyst, where I took on additional responsibilities as a subject matter expert, contributing to the development of best practices and creating knowledge base articles. I managed escalations, coordinating closely with development teams to drive effective issue resolution, while continuing to provide high-level technical support and guidance.

Feb 2022 - Feb 2023

Technical Assistance Center - Representative

Interactive Brokers

Provided technical and functional support for mobile, desktop, and web applications via phone, chat, and ticketing systems. Responsibilities included conducting connectivity and network testing, ensuring security protocol compliance, and managing problem resolution for large-scale technical issues. Acted as a liaison between internal teams and customers to ensure timely resolution of bugs and issues, managed escalations to the development team, and addressed client inquiries regarding IBKR’s two-factor secure login system.

Jun 2021 - Feb 2022

Interests

Over the years, I have dedicated time to learning several languages, both for personal growth and to better connect with people from diverse backgrounds. Hence, I am currently:

Giphy.com Clone
Html, TailWindCSS, JavaScript, React, Giphy API

Giphy.com clone built using React+Vite and the Giphy API. This project allows users to search for GIFs, view trending GIFs, and interact with GIFs (Share, Favorites) just like the original Giphy platform.
